text:
Lowering standards for black and female students results in those students entering into an academic environment they are not qualified for. Then, when they fall behind, they are told it is because of racism or the patriarchy.

It is cruel to admit these unqualified students so that administrators get more diverse photos on their college website.

The left has decided that if an employer administers a test and black applicants fail at higher rates than white applicants, that amounts to discrimination and the test must be thrown out.

The concept of disparate impact is the greatest weapon against merit and excellence. https://t.co/7xi2Nu1y3f
RT @ManhattanInst: "It's really a cruel thing for anybody to be catapulted into an environment for which he's not competitively qualified.…

Is excellence a dog whistle signaling white privilege?  Is sexism holding down would-be female AI entrepreneurs?  Did the West invent and preserve slavery against the wishes of a beneficent world? I discuss these and other matters with John Stossel.
https://t.co/D8DhTxGA1W

Women overwhelmingly value equity and emotional safety over the pursuit of truth and academic freedom. Men are the opposite.

It's going to take more parents standing up for their sons and fewer CEOs being browbeaten by their wives to stop the feminization of universities and society at large.

Watch more of my discussion with @JohnStossel:
https://t.co/6mAJXFcL76

For decades, New York mayor Zohran Mamdani’s ideological allies, some now working in his administration, fought for the right of mentally ill drug addicts to resist being placed into shelter and treatment. Upon election to City Hall, Mamdani promised a hands-off approach to homeless encampments, guaranteeing that such street obstructions further destroy New York’s public spaces and further degrade the lives of their occupants. Mamdani should not be surprised, then, that people have died on the streets since the Sunday snowstorm; his compatriots encouraged them to stay there.

Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson dismissed the immolation of a woman on a Chicago subway car as an "isolated incident" and thinks that gunshot detection technology is racist. Donald Trump, unlike any other president, denounces individual violence such as the Chicago subway burning; Trump refuses to accept the crime status quo. Who cares more about cities?
You can have meritocracy, or you can have diversity. You cannot have both. https://t.co/Zj3CAcNwmX

The female crack-up continues. After having flocked to pro-Hamas protests in favor of murderers and misogynists, females are now obstructing federal officers in Minneapolis and elsewhere, oblivious to the rule of law. The more feminized the culture, the less it will be guided by reason.

New from me in @CityJournal:

The New York Times is so desperate to condemn Trump's use of the National Guard, it has deliberately drawn attention to black-on-black crime.

The power of the taboo in elite circles against noticing black-on-black crime cannot be overstated. The Times' breach of the contemporary code of racial etiquette will be temporary, but Trump's focus on crime and disorder will not be.
https://t.co/thm0yVOeFq

No one is surprised to learn of the religion and ethnic background of the perpetrators of Islamic terrorist attacks in the West.

No one is surprised to learn that the mentally ill vagrants who commit weekly street crimes in American cities have long criminal records and have avoided jail time.

The solution is simple: Stop allowing entrance from third-world countries that harbor terrorists, put criminals in jail, and institutionalize the mentally ill.

Do not trust the public school system.

Virtually every month is an LGBTQ Pride month in the L.A. Unified School District. Children in Los Angeles and elsewhere are marinated in anti-Western ideology and anti-White racism. Public elementary school teachers celebrated Charlie Kirk's assassination, disqualifying themselves from any role in training young minds.

New Yorkers shouldn't have to fear that they will be pushed onto subway tracks or assaulted on the street by mentally ill, drug addicted vagrants.

Any government that tolerates such routine chaos has lost its legitimacy. https://t.co/moaAs0MKWF
